title: 07/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains how Tom Brady deserves to have an ego after teams like Miami and others passed on him. Texas and Oklahoma are ready to move over to the SEC. Expect major moves for the Lakers next season after the rumors on Dennis Schroder & Kyle Kuzma feuding. The NFL drops a major hammer on non-vaccinated players that will affect both teams. Plus, Colin defends his Top 10 NBA Players going into next season!


Guest: Jake Paul

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
